high_descs: Turn around and face the bed.
Pick up the blue pillow from the head of the bed.
Carry the blue pillow and turn to the left and then left again to find the small brown desk.
Hold the pillow and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Holding a pillow and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed
Pick up the blue pillow that is sitting on the bed
Turn around and walk to the table that is behind you. The table that is sitting to the left of the desk and has a lamp on it
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the table
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by lamp light

high_descs: Turn around and face the bed.
Pick up the blue pillow from the bed.
Turn around and walk across the room to the desk.
Turn the lamp on at the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the blue pillow, turn on the desk lamp.
